channel.title: Morgan's Blog
channel.description: Engineering deep dives, architecture notes, and backend lessons.

item.title: Quick feedback: ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE with nullable columns
item.description: How to use NULLS NOT DISTINCT to make ON CONFLICT and unique indexes behave as expected with nullable columns.

item.title: Antigravity vs Cursor vs Claude Code: The Battle for the Developer's Soul
item.description: A comparative analysis of developer AI agents through value, workflow impact, and infrastructure economics.

item.title: From Smart to Sport: Why I Traded My Apple Watch for the COROS APEX 4
item.description: A field review of endurance-watch tradeoffs for ultra trail training and race-day reliability.

item.title: The Force Multiplier: AI as the New Engineering Substrate
item.description: Why staff-level engineering shifts from raw implementation to orchestration when AI acceleration becomes ubiquitous.

item.title: New Chapter: Joining RockFi as Staff Back-end Engineer
item.description: Career update and technical mission context for building a scalable wealth-management platform.

item.title: Idempotency and Debounce in BullMQ: hardening jobs with a jobify contract
item.description: How to implement idempotent, debounced queue execution semantics with deterministic identifiers in BullMQ.

item.title: Jobify over BullMQ: a production pattern for jobs, workers, and queues (with NestJS)
item.description: A production-ready queue orchestration pattern over BullMQ with stricter worker contracts and safer operations.

item.title: Node.js Backpressure for Massive History Exports: Streams, Async Generators, and S3 Multipart
item.description: Production patterns for exporting massive historical datasets with bounded memory and resilient throughput.
